publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4312<> Linda Fabiani: Welcome to the CIVICUS World Assembly—That the Parliament welcomes the CIVICUS World Assembly to be held in Glasgow in June 2006; notes and recognises the work of the Scottish Council for Voluntary Organisations in securing and organising this event in Scotland for the next three years; commends the work of CIVICUS in promoting civil society throughout the world; welcomes the interaction of voluntary organisations and the exchange of ideas and experiences to develop common strategies to improve justice and democracy; recognises that delegates to the world assembly are from grassroots organisations which campaign for the poorest and most disadvantaged members of society, and believes that MSPs should support this event actively.
S2M-4312<> Welcome to the CIVICUS World Assembly (lodged on 28 April 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4312<> Welcome to the CIVICUS World Assembly (lodged on 28 April 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4312*#* Linda Fabiani: Welcome to the CIVICUS World Assembly—That the Parliament welcomes the CIVICUS World Assembly to be held in Glasgow in June 2006; notes and recognises the work of the Scottish Council for Voluntary Organisations in securing and organising this event in Scotland for the next three years; commends the work of CIVICUS in promoting civil society throughout the world; welcomes the interaction of voluntary organisations and the exchange of ideas and experiences to develop common strategies to improve justice and democracy; recognises that delegates to the world assembly are from grassroots organisations which campaign for the poorest and most disadvantaged members of society, and believes that MSPs should support this event actively. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie, Tricia Marwick*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Eleanor Scott*
